LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_HighExplosive.desc: A shell filled with high explosives. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_Cluster.label: cluster recoilless rifle shell
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_Cluster.descriptio: A cluster bomb that contain 8 bomblets for wide area of effect. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_WP.label: WP smoke recoilless rifle shell
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_WP.description: A smoke shell that pop smoke upon impact. Hit chance of bullets path through smoke is reduced 70%. Don't shoot it at your friends because white phosphorus is dangerous.
LanguageData.Bullet_RecoillessRifle_Shell_WP.label: WP recoilless rifle shell
LanguageData.Bullet_RecoillessRifle_Shell_WP.descript: A smoke shell that pop smoke upon impact. Hit chance of bullets path through smoke is reduced 70%. Don't shoot it at your friends because white phosphorus is dangerous.
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_Incendiary.label: incendiary recoilless rifle shell
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_Incendiary.descrip: A cluster bomb that contain 20 small incendiary bomb. Explodes when damaged.
A cluster bomb that contain 20 small incendiary bomb. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_EMP.label: EMP recoilless rifle shell
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_EMP.description: A shell filled with batteries and antennas. Electromagnetic pulses temporarily disable electrical circuits. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Bullet_Shell_EMP.label: EMP recoillessRifle shell
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_Shrapnel.label: shrapnel recoilless rifle shell
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_Shrapnel.descripti: A canister shell with a timed fuse. Same bullet dispersion at any distance. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_Canister.label: canister recoilless rifle shell
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_Canister.descripti: A shotgun shell filled with 100 pellets. The pellets disperse at long distance. Very effective in an open field. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_HEAT.label: HEAT recoilless rifle shell
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_HEAT.description: A high-explosive-anti-tank shell. Deals extra damage on direct hit. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Bullet_RecoillessRifle_Shell_HEAT.label: HEAT recoilless rifle shell
LanguageData.Bullet_RecoillessRifle_Shell_HEAT.descri: A high-explosive-anti-tank shell. Deals extra damage on direct hit. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_AP.label: AP recoilless rifle shell
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_AP.description: An Armor piercing shell with extra propellant for higher muzzle velocity.
LanguageData.Bullet_RecoillessRifle_Shell_AP.label: AP recoilless_rifle shell
LanguageData.Bullet_RecoillessRifle_Shell_AP.descript: An Armor piercing shell with extra propellant for higher muzzle velocity.
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_APDS.label: APDS recoilless rifle shell
LanguageData.RecoillessRifle_Shell_APDS.description: An Armor piercing discarding sabot shell.Armour penetration is increased by concentrating the force of a shell into as small an area as possible.
LanguageData.Bullet_RecoillessRifle_Shell_Sabot.label: Sabot recoilless_rifle shell
LanguageData.Bullet_RecoillessRifle_Shell_Sabot.descr: An Armor piercing discarding sabot shell. much greater muzzle velocity.
